title: (x) Noko Jeans sans serif - Gotham {J. Edward Sanchez}
content:
Didn’t work to attach an image so,  
I just put the link [here](http://web.archive.org/web/20081122051140/http:/nokojeans.com/process/wp-content/themes/noko/logo.gif) instead.

Could it be [Gotham](http://web.archive.org/web/20081122051140/http:/www.typography.com/fonts/font_styles.php?productLineID=100008)?

 [‹ (x) Park Tool logo - Crille {Lex}](http://web.archive.org/web/20081122051140/http:/www.typophile.com/node/47619 "Go to previous forum topic") [Geometric sans S Magazine headline face ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081122051140/http:/www.typophile.com/node/47607 "Go to next forum topic")
author: 1UP

comments.content:
Yes, it’s Gotham Bold.

That was easy.
